message:
Pretty solid overall. I am enjoying this. 
I like the concept of this series. Keep up the good work!

Sam Gilman brings us Old Gods pt. 1, the first in a series on unique old games, the features that set them apart, and the developers behind them. This piece follows Dungeon Keeper 2, a radical strategy game from now-defunct Bullfrog Studios. This and other articles by Gilman promise to be a can't-miss series for fans of the god game genre.  http://tehpwngaming.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=144%3Adk2&catid=47%3Alast-added-tutorilas&Itemid=56
